snippet: Federal prosecutors in Boston said that a former associate dean at the Sloan School of Management of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and his son had agreed to plead guilty to conspiracy.
abstract: Federal prosecutors in Boston say Gabriel Bitran, former associate dean at Sloan School of Management of Massachusetts Institute of Technology, and his son had agreed to plead guilty to conspiracy committed while they ran investment businesses GMB Capital Management.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in Boston said that a former associate dean at the Sloan School of Management of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and his son had agreed to plead guilty to conspiracy.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Former Associate Dean to Plead Guilty in Case on Investments
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Former Associate Dean to Plead Guilty in Case on Investments
